page_content:
Send Messages to Users

Version:MissionOS_2.0

The Send Message functionality is a powerful feature that you can use to broadcast important updates, send personalized notifications, or stay connected with your users in real time. This feature makes it easier to communicate effectively and efficiently.

A message can be sent to all users with access to the portal by following the steps below:

  1. In the Portal Homepage, navigate to the header and click open Admin Tools menu.
  2. From the dropdown list, select Send Message. (Refer to figure 1)
    A pop-up appears.
  3. In the pop-up, type the desired note.
  4. Click Send Message. (Refer to figure 2)
    The message gets successfully sent to all logged in users.
    A confirmation message appears for the sender of the message.
  5. Click OK to confirm.
